      • DefaultPathBuilderFactory

        public DefaultPathBuilderFactory(DefaultPathBuilderFactory.PathBuilder builder,
                                 boolean reconstructPaths)
        Creates a new instance of the DefaultPathBuilderFactory class
        Parameters:
        builder - The path building algorithm to use
        reconstructPaths - Specifies whether the exact propagation paths between source and sink shall be reconstructed if supported by the chosen path building algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • createPathBuilder

        public IAbstractionPathBuilder createPathBuilder(int maxThreadNum,
                                                 IInfoflowCFG icfg)
        Description copied from interface: IPathBuilderFactory
        Creates a new path builder
        Specified by:
        createPathBuilder in interface IPathBuilderFactory
        Parameters:
        maxThreadNum - The maximum number of threads to use
        icfg - The interprocedural CFG to use
        Returns:
        The newly created path builder

      • supportsPathReconstruction

        public boolean supportsPathReconstruction()
        Description copied from interface: IPathBuilderFactory
        Gets whether the IAbstractionPathBuilder object created by this factory supports the reconstruction of the exact paths between source and sink.
        Specified by:
        supportsPathReconstruction in interface IPathBuilderFactory
        Returns:
        True if the IAbstractionPathBuilder object constructed by this factory gives the exact propagation path between source and sink, false if it only reports source-to-sink connections without paths.
